channel.title: Interleaved RSS Feed
channel.description: This is an interleaved feed of the most recent entries from each RSS source, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Why a ‚Äòdo-nothing‚Äô Congress is a winning vote for your stock portfolio
item.description: The U.S. stock market on average has done better when Congress is not in session.

item.title: Mortgage refinance demand jumps to a 2-year high, as mortgage rates drop
item.description: Mortgage rates dropped to the lowest level since March last week, sparking swift demand in refinancing.

item.title: UK's Labour vows planning reform and clean energy transition as King's Speech reveals key policies
item.description: The U.K.'s new Labour government on Wednesday outlined a raft of proposed legislation, including the nationalization of rail operators.

item.title: Trump survives g, stock up 50%

item.title: Global stock investor Jim Rogers: ‚ÄòI‚Äôm waiting for something to go wrong.‚Äô
item.description: ‚ÄòProbably by the end of this year or next year, the bear market will have resumed in the U.S.,‚Äô Quantum Fund co-founder says.

item.title: Biden tells Democratic lawmakers he is weighing big reforms to the Supreme Court
item.description: The president is considering backing term limits for justices and a binding code of ethics, sources say. The proposals would require congressional approval.

item.title: Stock futures retreat as investors continue to dump tech winners like Nvidia: Live updates
item.description: The Dow Jones Industrial Average closed at a fresh record on Tuesday.

item.title: Temperature-controlled warehouse REIT Lineage sets terms for the biggest IPO of 2024
item.description: Company to raise up to $3.85 billion at a valuation of up to $19.2 billion

item.title: Spirit Airlines forecasts wider quarterly loss as revenue falls short of expectations
item.description: Spirit Airlines said Tuesday it would post a wider-than-expected loss for the last quarter because of revenue that came in short of its expectations.

item.title: Reckitt's baby formula sales to suffer after tornado damages Indiana warehouse
item.description: Sales of Reckitt's Mead Johnson baby formula powder are likely to take a short-term hit after a tornado damaged a third-party warehouse in the United States.

item.title: Hurry! Only 8 seats left at 75% off

That‚Äôs nearly 2-months without a loss in Journey. The tiny $2,000 balance, at its peak, hit $47,965 June 13 up 2,298%. Definitely not typical but pretty awesome, right?! [‚Ä¶]

item.title: Leading Fed official says he still wants more data before supporting rate cut
item.description: A leading Federal Reserve official says he still needs a little more convincing before endorsing an interest-rate cut, a comment that all but rules out a reduction later this month.

item.title: Iran plot to kill Trump prompted Secret Service to boost protection before rally shooting
item.description: The Secret Service has faced criticism over the attempted assassination of Donald Trump by Thomas Crooks, weeks after learning of the Iran plot.

item.title: Adidas shares rise 3% after hiking 2024 guidance
item.description: Shares in Adidas rose on Wednesday after the company announced it would hike its full year 2024 earnings guidance.

item.title: My adviser told me to take Social Security early ‚Äî and save $2.5 million for our kids. But shouldn‚Äôt I delay as long as I can?
item.description: ‚ÄúOur kids and grandkids won‚Äôt get our Social Security if we pass away at a younger age.‚Äù

item.title: Amazon's deal with AI startup Adept faces FTC scrutiny
item.description: Regulators in the U.S. and abroad are increasingly zeroing in on tech companies' investments and partnerships with AI companies.

item.title: Gold prices notches fresh record on Fed rate cut optimism
item.description: Gold prices continued to notch a new record on Wednesday, lifted by increasing optimism of a September interest rate.
